attributes.action: Ban the general sale (and public use) of fireworks, keep to organised displays.
attributes.background: My dog is currently literally vibrating with fear, will not go out to relieve himself and, if I do get him out chokes himself trying to get back indoors. Fireworks are happening all around us bringing terror to both domestic and wild animals from Halloween to late November, it is time to end it.

rejection.details:
We already have three petitions on the subject of restricting the sale of fireworks:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109702

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109111

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/110683
